```{r clinical_data}

clinical <- fread("clinical.tsv")

colnames(clinical)


clinical[clinical == "'--"] <- NA

clinical_clean <- clinical %>% 
  select_if(~ mean(is.na(.)) < 0.9)

colnames(clinical_clean)
```
